clarity_understandability.notes: Assesses overall clarity, ease of understanding, and definition quality. Glossary complete, TBDs actionable, typos addressed.

completeness_issue_resolution.notes: Assesses how well all necessary requirements are covered and if reflection issues are resolved. All major reflection points addressed.

actionability_fitness_for_purpose.notes: Assesses how well the PRD enables the next stage of development. Actionable TBDs significantly improve readiness.

correctness_formatting_review.notes: Assesses accuracy of information, formatting consistency, and resolution of typos/errors. Formatting and major typos resolved.

product_security_nfr_coverage.notes: Assesses how well security NFRs for the product are covered in the PRD. No changes from LS1 as it was deemed adequate.
